clothing_items.fabric: heavy leather with pronounced folds and wrinkles, puffy and spongy texture, supple and thick, buttery smooth finish, padded construction, rugged and sturdy appearance
clothing_items.details: Asymmetrical zip-front closure, notched lapel collar with snap details, long sleeves with zip cuffs, multiple zip and snap pockets, belted waist, shoulder epaulettes, distressed finish with visible wear and tear, silver-tone hardware, graphic patch on the back with 'FOLLOW YOUR LEADER' text and cowboy figures
Crew neck, short sleeves, graphic print featuring stylized imagery and text, standard fit
